the period and there might be like one or or more periods period is a Time

content insertion such as ads for example but usually there is only
one um then inide the period we may have uh one or more adapation sets and

to give you when it will be used is to when we uh start supporting the Adaptive

controls its distribution and there are three most common drms out there uh which are
